data.product: Pendant Ceramic Lamp, Hanging Lampshade, Handmade Design, Contemporary Artwork Creation, Unique Light Fixture Gift
data.description:
This piece was created in the innovative studio of the designer-maker Noa Razer, which is located in Tel Aviv, Israel, and It is part of the Apilar collection.
The Apilar collection ('stack' in Spanish) began to take shape during a family roots trip to southern Spain, influenced by the differentiated and unique Spanish ceramics. In this collection, there are nine different shapes, from which all structures of the collection are built. Countless creation options are formed by stacking the shapes one on top of the other into new complex compositions with spectacular colors.
On top of the pieces are ceramic prints, inspired by traditions from different cultures, creating a contemporary cultural collage.
The designer is engaged in ongoing research, visual as well as theoretical, focusing on traditional ceramics as a cultural carrier and searching for a sense of belonging through the local material culture.
Color: Green, pink, teal
Measurements:Height	5.9 inch
Diameter of 5.5 inch

data.description:
Imagine moving dinner parties to the floor, lounging in a reading nook, or creating a magical, comfortable playroom. With our new floor pillows those dreams are now realities!
The original print for this floor pillow was created in our design studio in Maine & the floor pillow is made to order thanks to the help of our fabulous sewing partner.
Two different shapes-the circle and the square-plus two different sizes... All those choices equals soft, comfy, and oh-so-pretty floor pillows that are great on their own, or stacked for even more comfort. Let's be honest-chairs are so last year.

••• PLEASE NOTE •••
The pillows have a small "X" stitch detail in the center of the pillow... tacking the front & back together. This stitch detail helps secure the pillow filling so it doesn't shift around over time... keeping your pillow plump and comfy sit after sit after sit :)

PRODUCT DIMENSIONS
(Please note there is a 1"-2" tolerance on all printed textile products)

23" Round : 23" x 7" Tall
26" Round : 26" x 7" Tall
23" Square : 23" x 23" x 7" Tall
26" Square : 26" x 26" x 7" Tall

PRODUCT DETAILS
100% woven polyester printed fabric
Sewn closed with premium poly fill

CARE INSTRUCTIONSSpot clean only

PRODUCTION
Please allow up to 5 - 10 business days for production of your custom made item.

• PLEASE NOTE •
I am currently unable to deliver to PO Boxes. Please provide a physical mailing address with your order. Thanks!

RETURN POLICY FOR THIS PRODUCTYour floor pillow is custom made just for you and as a result I am unable to offer returns/exchanges unless your item arrives damaged or defective.

uniqueAttributes.Customizable: The floor pillow is made to order, allowing customers to choose from two shapes (circle or square) and two sizes (23" or 26") to create a pillow that perfectly fits their needs and preferences.
uniqueAttributes.Unique print: The original print for the floor pillow is created in the designer's Maine studio, making it a one-of-a-kind piece that cannot be found anywhere else.
uniqueAttributes.Durable construction: The pillow is sewn closed with premium poly fill and has a small "X" stitch detail in the center to secure the filling and prevent it from shifting over time, ensuring the pillow's longevity and comfort.
uniqueAttributes.Versatile usage: The floor pillow is not only comfortable for sitting, but it can also be used as a decorative accent piece, a playroom essential, or a comfortable addition to a reading nook.
uniqueAttributes.Easy care: The pillow is spot clean only, making it easy to maintain and keep looking its best.

data.product: Stroke / Brushstroke Illustrated Parian Porcelain Vase
data.description: This vase is slipcast in Parian porcelain, which is marble smooth and delicately translucent. It is glazed inside and left matte and unglazed outside to celebrate the material qualities of the clay. The vase is hand illustrated with bold brushstrokes against a bright white base. Each piece is polished by hand to create a silky smooth finish. The vase is perfect as a stand out piece for a mantlepiece, sideboard, or as a centre piece for your dining table. It is ideal for holding bundles of your favourite blooms and leafy bouquets.

data.description: This Color Therapy Pillow is a vibrant and cheerful home decor piece that is sure to brighten up any space. Handcrafted by an indigenous family in Cuenca, Ecuador, the pillow's colorful stripes are woven on an antique loom, creating a unique and artisanal touch. Made from 100% hand-loomed cotton, the pillow is soft and comfortable, with a hidden zipper at the bottom for easy insertion and removal of the pillow insert. With its versatile design, the Color Therapy Pillow can complement a wide range of interior styles, from modern to traditional. The purchase of this pillow not only adds a touch of color to your home but also supports the empowerment of women and girls in the indigenous community.

uniqueAttributes.Handwoven: The fabric is 100% hand-loomed cotton, which gives it a unique and artisanal quality that cannot be replicated by mass-produced items.
uniqueAttributes.Indigenous origin: The cloth is made by an indigenous family in Cuenca, Ecuador, and the colorful stripes are woven on an antique loom, which adds a cultural and historical significance to the pillow.
uniqueAttributes.Empowering women: The purchase of this pillow supports the women and girls of this community, who wear this cloth as a skirt, fostering a sense of sisterhood and empowerment.

data.description:
The Modern Herringbone House Number Sign is the perfect address sign for a modern home exterior. The backer is made out of wood and the numbers are acrylic - the wood is sealed with an exterior grade sealer to help preserve its life. Keep in mind these are still wood and being under a covered area is still advised to preserve and protect the wood. 

The backer can be any stain or paint color shown on our color charts -  note in the personalizationarea what paint or stain you would like. 

The text can only be black or white 

Select if you want it vertical or horizontal 

The numbers will be made to fit the sign regardless of how many numbers you order. Less numbers will be taller and centered on the sign. If you need a custom size please reach out and I would be happy to help. 

The sign is 7" x 21" shown with early american stain. Keep in mind all wood will stain differently. 

We use a high-quality cabinet grade 1/2" thick baltic birch wood or 3/8" water-resistant MDF if painted. 

These come with either a sawtooth hanger on the back or a d-ring.

data.description:
This adorable WELCOME sign will add a colorful touch to your front door is our latest design, capturing the trendy floral designs so prevalent in today's decor. The sign is made of solid wood with painted on letters.

* **Solid wood**: The sign is made of solid wood, making it durable and long-lasting. This sets it apart from generic signs made of flimsy materials.
* **Hand-painted letters**: The letters on the sign are hand-painted, which gives them a unique and personal touch. This is in contrast to generic signs that often have vinyl stickers or spray-painted letters which can peel or fade over time.
* **Distressed look**: The sign has a distressed look, which adds to its rustic charm. This is achieved through a specific staining and distressing process, giving the sign a unique and aged appearance.
* **Accuracy in spacing and centering**: The sign has been designed with precision in the spacing and centering of the letters. This ensures that the sign looks balanced and well-made, unlike generic signs that may have uneven or off-center lettering.
* **Customization options**: The sign can be customized to suit individual preferences. This includes the option to have it hung on a wall or to have a freestanding design. Generic signs typically do not offer such customization options.

This small wooden stool embodies Scandinavian decor with its minimalist design and natural wood finish. Crafted for versatility, it seamlessly fits into any space, offering both functionality and timeless style. A perfect addition for those seeking a touch of Nordic charm.

- Natural, Walnut, Oak, Light Oak, Antic Oak, Teak or Black

We also have an additional swatch - Sampler 2. These are our latest colors. If frozen green, winter blush, or other shades from this swatch caught your eye, you can purchase a piece of furniture by selecting any shade from the list, and in the comments to your order, enter the correct name of the shade you would like to receive, or contact me by sending a private message - I will guide you through the purchase process.

data.description:

FORMAT OPTIONS
Decimal Degree:  41.8781° N, 87.6297° W
Lat Long: 41.8781, -87.6297
GPS: 41° 52' 41.21'' N, 87° 37' 47.27'' W

If you do not specify your format preference, we will engrave the Decimal Degree format.

We are limited to the driftwood and sizes we have available and cannot guarantee availability of preferences. Also, please remember, part of what makes our artwork so special is that no two pieces of wood are the same, and so everything is one of a kind.

data.product: Extra Large Farmhouse Window Pane Mirror
data.description:
This Super Extra Large Farmhouse Reclaimed Wood Window Pane Mirror is constructed with butt joints and features a combination of 2.5" & 3.25" wide molding on the outside, 1" dividers and 12 --10" Square Panes, this barnwood window pane mirror is the perfect addition to your rustic or farmhouse decor.  This reclaimed barnwood mirror is available in Natural Barnwood* (this is real aged/weathered wood and colors and textures vary, from browns to grays), Reclaimed Natural (reclaimed wood sanded and sealed to a light brown natural color) any of the painted wellworn color finishes as shown and includes frame, mirror, solid hardboard backing and wire/hangers for hanging the mirror.SHUTTERS SOLD SEPARATELY . Check them out at:https://www.etsy.com/listing/201635725NOW AVAILABLE in horizontal orientation with the handles on the long side (46 wide X 36 tall) or Vertical orientation (36 wide X 46 tall) with the handles on the shorter side.
Compare similar products at $299+-Since we send these out with hanging wire installed and hook hardware included, this windowpane mirror is easy to hang.-Includes: mirror, pull handles (optional), card board backing and sawtooth picture hangers.-Choose between natural/unpainted wood for a more primitive decor or have it painted to give your decor a pop of color.* (If you would prefer a frame more gray or brown just add a note when checking out or send us an email). They will also have knots, nail holes, weathered cracks and other characteristics adding to its rustic beauty.*If you enjoy this product, check out our Etsy shop for more rustic barn wood decor.https://www.etsy.com/shop/ABWframes***SHARE THE LOVE...click on the pinterest "pin it" button just under the "Add to Cart" button***

data.description: The metal bookend is a modern and stylish L-shaped holder that measures 5" long on the bottom, 6" tall, and 3.5" wide. It is made from 16 gauge steel, which is approximately the thickness of a quarter coin, making it durable and sturdy. The metal is left untreated to maintain its natural finish, resulting in slight variations in coloration and markings, giving each piece its own unique characteristics. The bookend is designed and created by the shop-owner and her father, giving it a personal touch and supporting local artisanship. The shop also gives back 10% of its profit to partners with Jubilee Trading Co., which employs artisans in Morocco to create dignified jobs with fair wages. This social responsibility aspect sets it apart from generic bookends. The bookend is sold individually, allowing customers to purchase the exact quantity they need, unlike generic bookends that may come in fixed sets.
